episodes.description:

The accusations started when Pastor Ben Gitau exposed Pastor Peter K’s actions, leading to public outrage. The situation escalated when angry residents stormed Pastor Peter K’s church, demanding justice.

Pastor Paul Mackenzie shook the nation with the horrifying Shakahola Forest massacre, where hundreds of his followers allegedly starved to death under his orders. Pastor Paul Mackenzie’s radical teachings condemned education, healthcare, and modern institutions, convincing his congregation to isolate themselves from society.

As Pastor Paul Mackenzie faces trial for manslaughter and terrorism charges, Kenyans are left questioning how such a tragedy could happen.

Despite his past, Pastor Kanyari continues to thrive in the religious space, proving that controversy only fuels his brand.
